programme.desc: After their 5-0 whitewash against Italy last time out, the Lionhearts face the France Fighting Roosters and a win will put them in prime position to qualify top from Group B of this season's WSB

programme.title: Greatest Boxing Classics
programme.desc: Nicknamed Half-Man, Half-Amazing, heavyweight KO specialist Jeremy Williams takes on Phil Jackson in this selection from the archives of USA Network's Tuesday Night Fights from February 1997

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Marco Huck faces dangerous Cruiserweight Mairis Briedis for the WBC interim World Title at the Westfalenhalle in Dortmund, Germany

programme.title: Boxing Matters - Fighting Cities
programme.desc: A new series about the cities that have become famous fight capitals. This episode looks at the rich history of Manchester in the boxing world

programme.title: BoxNation Presents
programme.desc: Clinton Woods hadn't beaten Glen Johnson in two previous attempts. Now he had a third chance to topple the big Jamaican, as he defended his IBF light heavyweight title

programme.title: Greatest Boxing Classics
programme.desc: Seven years after knocking out Mike Tyson in Tokyo, 'Buster' Douglas continues his comeback against Louis Monaco in this selection from the archives of USA Network's Tuesday Night Fights from 1997

programme.title: The Main Events
programme.desc: Twins Liam and Ryan Walsh were on the same card at the Copper Box in April 2016. Ryan Walsh v James Tennyson and Liam Walsh v Troy James

programme.title: A Fight to Remember
programme.desc: KO Special: We go back to the York Hall 1996 where Kevin Lueshing took on Chris Saunders in a classic tear up for the British Welterweight title on a packed card

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Four belt holder and boxing superstar Gennady Golovkin takes on Danny Jacobs

programme.title: Boxing Matters
programme.desc: Alex Steedman presents this show on BoxNation. Every time a big fight's coming up, Alex and guests will preview the action with exclusive interviews from the fighters. Why? Because Boxing Matters

programme.title: The Main Events
programme.desc: Terry Flanagan puts his title on the line against Petr Petrov, as well as a great British tear up as Liam Smith takes on Liam Williams. Rising star Daniel Dubois makes his debut, as does Nicola Adams

programme.title: Premium Pass
programme.desc: All the fights that matter in the build up to Flanagan v Petrov. Local fighters Mark Heffron, Zelfa Barrett, Jimmy Kelly and Paul butler all in action

Evroliga - 30. Round: CSKA Moskva - Olympiacos
programme.desc: Evroliga je najkvalitetnejše in najbolje organizirano klubsko košarkarsko tekmovanje na stari celini, ki je pred letošnjo sezono doživelo kar nekaj sprememb, a kljub temu se nam obeta nova sezona izjemnih košarkarskih užitkov. Najuspešnejši klub je madridski Real. Aktualni prvaki so košarkarji CSKA-ja iz Moskve

programme.title: Spanish league: Villarreal - Athletic Bilbao
programme.desc: Španska nogometna liga, bolj poznana pod vzdevkom La Liga, je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje v Španiji. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1929. V ligi nastopa 20 klubov, kjer vsako sezono nekdo postane prvak in izpade v špansko drugo ligo. Najuspešnejša kluba sta madridski Real in Barcelona. Skupaj sta ligo osvojila kar 55 krat. Zadnji naslov je romal v roke Barcelone

programme.desc: Evroliga je najkvalitetnejše in najbolje organizirano klubsko košarkarsko tekmovanje na stari celini, ki je pred letošnjo sezono doživelo kar nekaj sprememb, a kljub temu se nam obeta nova sezona izjemnih košarkarskih užitkov. programme.title: UEFA Europa League: Magazin
programme.desc: Po letih vladavine Seville bomo letos dobili novega zmagovalca v Evropski ligi. Kdo bo Andaluzijce nasledil na prestolu? Vse zanimivosti o drugem najelitnejšem evropskem klubskem tekmovanju izveste v magazinu

programme.title: Evroliga - 30. Round: Darussafaka - Crvena zvezda
programme.desc: Crvena zvezda si je napredovanje v izločilne boje poskušala zagotoviti že pred zadnjim krogom, toda usoda je hotela, da bo o tem odločala v zadnjem krogu na medsebojnem obračunu proti Darušafaki. Medtem ko bo zmagovalec pobral vse, kot radi rečemo, bodo poraženci še nekaj časa obžalovali zapravljeno priložnost

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Magazin
programme.desc: Branilec naslova najmočnejšega klubskega nogometnega tekmovanja v Evropi je madridski Real, ki se je prek Atletica dokopal že do enajstega evropskega naslova. programme.title: Premier league: Prediction circle
programme.desc: Oglejte si vse zanimivosti pred novim krogom Premier lige

programme.title: Live! Premier league: Tottenham - Watford
programme.desc: Premier League je profesionalna nogometna liga v Angliji. V njej nastopa 20 klubov, ki se od avgusta do maja borijo za naslov prvaka. Večina tekem je odigranih ob sobotah in nedeljah popoldan, preostalih nekaj krogov pa med tednom zvečer. Premier League je najbolj gledana nogometna liga na svetu. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Leicestra

programme.title: Live! Spanish league: Real Madrid - Atletico Madrid
programme.desc: Atletico letos ni uspel resneje ogroziti Reala in Barcelone, colchonerosi se bodo morali pošteno potruditi celo za tretje mesto, saj Sevilla igra odlično in pridno nabira točke. Zmaga na mestnem madridskem derbiju bi Janu Oblaku in soigralcem zato prinesla še veliko več, kot le prestiž, toda jasno je, da vse ne bo odvisno le od njih. Ekipa Zinedina Zidana v zaključku sezone funkcionira vse bolje in v boju s Katalonci za prvi naslov po nekaj sušnih letih nujno potrebuje vse tri točke

programme.title: Live! Premier league: Bournemouth - Chelsea
programme.desc: Kdo še lahko ustavi Chelsea v pohodu na nov naslov angleških prvakov? Antonio Conte bo svojo ekipo tokrat odpeljal v Bournemouth, ki si je obstanek praktično že zagotovil in bo proti Londončanom lahko zaigral povsem neobremenjen

programme.title: Live! Spanish league: Malaga - Barcelona
programme.desc: Malaga je novembra na Camp Nou vzela točko, čeprav je srečanje končala z dvema izključenima igralcema, a je treba tudi dodati, da je Barcelona igrala brez Lionela Messija in Luisa Suareza. Argentinec in Urugvajec bosta tokrat zagotovo v kadru, saj si Katalonci v luči boja za naslov prvaka ne smejo privoščiti spodrsljaja. Lahko Malaga še enkrat preseneti aktualne španske prvake?

programme.title: Portugal liga: Feirense - Braga
programme.desc: Nekoč Primeira Liga, danes Liga NOS je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje na Portugalskem. V njej vsako leto sodeluje 18 klubov, vendar le pet je takšnih, ki so jo od leta 1934 (datum ustanovitve) tudi osvojili. Kar 81 od skupnih 83 naslovov je osvojila t.i. velika trojica (Benfica, Sporting in Porto) preostala dva naslova pa sta romala v roke Belenensesa in Boaviste. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Benfice

programme.title: Evroliga - 30. Round: Real Madrid - Anadolu Efes

programme.title: Italijanski pokal - 1/2 finale: Roma - Lazio

programme.title: Italijanski pokal - 1/2 finale: Napoli - Juventus

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)

programme.title: The Sports Reporters *
programme.desc: A changing panel of sports journalists discusses current stories in a series that launched in 1988, with Dick Schaap and John Saunders serving as hosts for all but the first and last year of a near three-decade run on Sunday mornings. programme.title: Top Shot

programme.title: Football today
programme.desc: Brought to you By Renegades

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur v Watford
programme.desc: Wednesday night's thrilling finish at Swansea keeps Tottenham in the title race, although Chelsea don't look like a team who are about to throw away a seven-point advantage at this stage of the season.Mauricio Pochettino's free-scoring side have won 12 of the last 15 games, while making only a small dent in Chelsea's lead, so just have to keep winning and hope for the best.Meanwhile, Watford have won their last two matches and have the same number of points as at this stage last season, but they haven't got a great record at White Hart Lane. It's 32 years since they last won there in the league

programme.title: Football today
programme.desc: Brought to you By Renegades

programme.title: AFC Bournemouth v Chelsea
programme.desc: A seven-point lead with eight games remaining is not a cast-iron guarantee of success, but it's hard to see the Blues straying from the blueprint which has taken them to the top.Don't forget that Antonio Conte won the championship with Juventus in each of his last three seasons as a club manager. The Italian knows his way around a run-in and will have delighted Chelsea by brushing aside rumours that he might decamp back to Serie A this summer.I was pretty concerned about Bournemouth a couple of months ago when it seemed they may be sucked into a relegation battle.Now that their defence is looking tighter - and Joshua King has embarked on a hot streak of nine goals in 10 games - improving on last season's 16th-place finish looks almost a certainty

programme.title: Manchester City v Hull City
programme.desc: The targets for both clubs are crystal clear: Manchester City have to be playing Champions League football next season, while Hull are desperate to keep their place at the top table.After a testing run against Liverpool, Arsenal and Chelsea which yielded only two points, Manchester City have little room for error and this is a fixture they will hope to tick off without any drama.Hull, though, have renewed belief following a run of nine points from the last 12 to kick-start their survival campaign.Significantly, all those points have come at home and their solitary win on the road was back in August at Swansea.However, as Crystal Palace proved last weekend, at this stage of the season you should never say never

programme.title: Middlesbrough v Burnley
programme.desc: After Wednesday's defeat at fellow strugglers Hull City, I thought this was a game Middlesbrough had to win.After checking their remaining fixtures, I'm now convinced victory is absolutely vital.You see, Boro still have to play Chelsea, Liverpool, Manchester City and Arsenal.Seven points adrift of safety and without a win since Christmas, things are looking desperate, but a home game against Burnley might just provide a much-needed chink of light.The Clarets' away record is easily the worst in the Premier League.On paper, it's the perfect chance for Boro to inject fresh hope into their survival bid. Fail to grab it and the fat lady can start warming up in the wings

programme.title: Stoke City v Liverpool
programme.desc: It's hard to know who to make favourites.Stoke? Much stronger at home, and unburdened by immediate relegation pressure.BUT…..three defeats in a row and one win from six is troubling form. They're not (mathematically) safe yet and perhaps need to engineer a sense of tension.Liverpool? Five games unbeaten and one defeat in seven - plus the other three teams in the top four have all won at Stoke this season.BUT….all five league defeats have come against sides currently in the bottom half, and their recent away form borders on rotten.Those still going for an away win might pair it with Definitly Red for the Grand National. Me? I'm sticking a pin in for both

programme.title: West Ham United v Swansea City
programme.desc: If West Ham lose this they will be deep in trouble, while Swansea's cave in against Tottenham means another defeat could open a chasm between them and safety.Slaven Bilic has the backing of the owners for now but he must get four points from this and the Sunderland away game next week. After that, Everton, Tottenham and Liverpool lurk in the run-in.Five defeats in a row and no wins in seven makes grim reading for the Hammers.Four consecutive away defeats is concerning for the Swans but for a long while they were decent against Spurs. They could catch West Ham on another nervy day at the new stadium

programme.title: West Bromwich Albion v Southampton
programme.desc: When Tony Pulis signed a contract extension in October, the club said establishing West Brom as a top-ten team was the aim.A win on Saturday would not only go a long way to ensuring they end up there this season, it would also keep them on track to equal their best league finish since 1981.It was always going to be a tough ask for Claude Puel to continue Southampton's impressive run of improving their position season on season.But a cup final appearance and ending up in the top eight would represent a good return in his first campaign as Saints boss.To have a chance of achieving that, they can't really afford a defeat in this one(c)

programme.title: West Bromwich Albion v Southampton
programme.desc: When Tony Pulis signed a contract extension in October, the club said establishing West Brom as a top-ten team was the aim.A win on Saturday would not only go a long way to ensuring they end up there this season, it would also keep them on track to equal their best league finish since 1981.It was always going to be a tough ask for Claude Puel to continue Southampton's impressive run of improving their position season on season.But a cup final appearance and ending up in the top eight would represent a good return in his first campaign as Saints boss.To have a chance of achieving that, they can't really afford a defeat in this one(c)
